docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
default: Vector
    The input vector that will be transformed into matrix.
docstring.short_description: Convert a Vector DataContainer to a Matrix DataContainer.

parameters.name: row
parameters.description: number of rows for the new matrix

parameters.name: col
parameters.description: number of columns for the new matrix

returns.description: The matrix that is generated from the given vector and the parameters.
